about_the_game:
"Challenge yourself in Stella Gladio, fast paced action precision plaformer! Play as Gladio, a daring adventurer, as you scale a mysterious tower with your witty companion—a talking magic sword named Stella. Together, uncover the tower's secrets, conquer challenging obstacles, discover their bond, and reach the top of the tower."

Core Gameplay Mechanic:

Use your abilities to warp/blink toward Stella to reach otherwise inaccessible places. However, you must throw Stella first. Be careful—once you throw Stella, you can’t call her back. The only way forward is to move toward her, making it a one-way ticket!

  • A Fast-Paced Precision Platformer: Once you get accustomed to the gameplay mechanics and environments, you'll experience fluid and precise movement.

  • Think Before You Throw: Stella’s path determines your destination. Once she’s thrown, that’s where you’re heading—there’s no turning back.

  • Simple Yet Engaging Mechanics: You can play with just one hand! The intuitive design focuses on mastering a single but versatile ability.

  • Quick to Fall, Quick to Recover: Mistakes happen, but staying calm and retracing your steps ensures you’re back in the action in no time.

  • No Saves or Checkpoints: Complete the game in one flawless run. A perfect run takes under 10 minutes, but getting there is a challenge.

  • Reach the Top, Don’t Fall: Climb the tower, overcome its obstacles, and make every move count. One slip could mean starting over!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060/Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD® FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2060/Radeon RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
